ValidationRule.description: SF-113 This validation rule should ensure, that all Zip Codes are in the correct format according to their respective country. Format ("\\d{4}[-]\\d{3}"). Example: 9999-999.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(MailingPostalCode)), MailingCountry == "PT"), NOT(REGEX(MailingPostalCode, ("\\d{4}[-]\\d{3}"))),FALSE) && $Permission.Core_Contact_Bypass_Validation_Rules = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid format for the Zip Code! This should start with four numbers, followed by a hyphen and three numbers. Example: 9999-999
